en-US.summary: Play the game of Baccarat betting on the player, banker, or a tie. Keep track of your bankroll as you play!
examplePhrases: Bet twenty dollars on the banker
en-US.name: Baccarat Table
en-US.description:
Play the game of Baccarat, tracking your bankroll as you play. You start with 5,000 dollars in credit and can vary your bet from 5 to 1,000 dollars. Bet on the player, banker, or a tie (optionally using an Echo Button to place your bet) - closest to 9 wins! Compare your bankroll with other players by saying "read high scores" to hear the leader board. Keep playing and you can move to the top! Try saying order a martini to add some sophistication to your game.

Have feedback or features you'd like to see? Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/alexacasinogames!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: You can say bet to play a round of baccarat, betting on the player, banker, or a tie outcome.
